amendment.description: To ensure timely and meaningful consultation between State educational agencies and Governors in the development of State plans under titles I and II and section 9302.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2121 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2121 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S4906, S4912, S4915; text: CR S4912) To ensure timely and meaningful consultation between State educational agencies and Governors in the development of State plans under titles I and II and section 9302.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2121 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2121 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 2089.
